backend/main.mo: Defines data models for profiles, bookings, messages, monetization, and system state maps with authorization and helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing compliance gate, routing integration, and launch-readiness checks with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout, guards, and page routes wrapped by CommissionComplianceGate.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSta: Renders a styled badge showing a companion profile’s status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to set their display name and saves it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Form dialog for submitting a booking request, validating inputs and sending data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/companions/Compa: Displays a companion profile card with image, name, description, category, and location, linking to the profile page.
Image gallery with modal viewer allowing navigation between companion photos.
frontend/src/components/compliance/AgeGa: Modal requiring users to confirm age before entering, with accept and decline actions.
frontend/src/components/compliance/Commi: Wrapper that checks user ban status and unpaid commissions, showing gating screens or allowing access accordingly.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Guard component that requires authentication and admin privileges before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAg: Enforces age confirmation using local storage and shows the age‑gate modal if not verified.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Protects routes by requiring user authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/Editorial: Layout helpers for editorial‑style sections including headline, subhead, and dividers.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, legal links, browse links, and attribution including dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header component showing navigation links based on auth state, with mobile menu support and login button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides user authorization info by querying the backend for role and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth lifecycle, exposing identity, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, compliance, commissions, and earnings using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with luxury palette.
frontend/src/lib/errorFormatting.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly strings including ban, commission, and authorization cases.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider around the root app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingDet: Admin view for inspecting booking details and updating booking status with query invalidation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin page listing bookings with tab-based filtering, status badges, and navigation to booking details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEarningsPa: Admin dashboard displaying earnings, monetization model details, and recent completed bookings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMonetizati: Form-driven page for viewing and updating monetization configuration, including model selection and fee inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfileEdi: Page for creating or editing a profile with fields for personal details, status, and validation before saving.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfilesPa: Admin interface listing profiles with actions to create, edit, or change status via dropdown controls.
Companion browsing page with search, category and city filters, and profile listing.
Displays a companion's profile with images, details, and a booking dialog, handling missing profiles and auth-gated booking actions.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and calls to browse available companions.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesConv: Renders a full conversation view between the logged‑in user and another principal, loading messages, handling errors, and sending new messages. Includes auto-scrolling, profile lookup, and message mutation logic.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesInbo: Displays the user's message threads, deduplicates them by counterpart principal, and links to each conversation. Shows loading state and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/MyCompanionProfilePag: Allows a signed-in user to create or edit their companion profile with form validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders a static privacy policy describing data collection, usage, storage, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/TermsDisclaimerPage.t: Displays legal terms and disclaimers regarding age requirements, permitted services, and liability.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from URL hashes. Supports both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout utilities with custom theme tokens. Registers plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current scope, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features with versioning metadata.
